replies.body: A smurf who mains yi, wowie
can we really call 400 games 54% wr  a smurf though
I get the feeling the concept of a smurf is new to you.

Reason why he is in Brooklyn is cuz when he's on your team he goes only 20 because he tries to Rambo it but when on the enemy team he gets 20 pentakills. Jokes aside just stun him then blow him up. Just flash ult him with {{champion:1}}  and then he dies
